transArray.content: This hotel is surprisingly good, but the room size is very, very small even with the deluxe king bed. Maybe this is the business strategy of this brand hotel. The breakfast is not bad. The facilities in the hotel are very high-end. It feels that although the sparrow is small, it has all internal organs. There was a small episode that I didn't know that the window was electric, so when I lifted the window vigorously, I accidentally let go and hit my finger. This may be my own problem.
